name: Rebroken
description:
This is a game about broken time. Pretty accurate considering how broken the game is and how much time we lacked. You will encounter maaaaany bugs and placeholder art. Only the music is as it should be. (It's good music, #1 reason to try the game out)

Music by Mufaya

Programming by Deaddanger, Pincellox and Jens Steenmetz

Art by Jens Steenmetz
